timeline.message:
Added SendCoinsInternalActivity being not exported version of SendCoinsActivity extended with ability to be authorised internally.
Finishing the app if it was launched from external.
If started from the shortcut, the app is closed after finishing the action

Displaying memo instead of payeeName.
Changed design of payment request details and result screens.

timeline.bodyText: This section will have merge conflicts with #406 .
timeline.author: HashEngineering

replies.bodyText:
I merged deeplink-payment-fix into bip70-updates and resolved conflicts.
This PR should be merged before #406.
replies.author: tomasz-ludek

replies.bodyText: If deeplink-payment-fix was merged into this PR, shouldn't #406 be merged to master before this PR #407?  Otherwise it seems that #406 would be an empty merge since all the code was merged with #406.  In any case, I will try it out locally before doing it on GitHub.
replies.author: HashEngineering
